title: Top position
text: The top position is the height above ground + window height.

title: Solving
text: We can use the formula as follow to get the upward velocity: top height - above ground height + .5*acceleration*time**2)/time.

title: Final Speed
text: Final $${speed}^2$$ $$=$$ inital $${speed}^2$$ - $$2acceleration$$ multipled by change in height

title: Initial Velocity
text: The inital velocity is equal to sqrt((upward velocity**2)+2*acceleration*height))
